body:
Will there be a way to turn it on by users?

On Sat, Sep 22, 2018, 21:57 Yuefeng Zhou <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Seems auto-sharding is not perfect for all use cases. I'll make it
> disabled by default.
>
> —
